name: Soulsaver: Spoopcore Side Story
description: You find yourself in another hell dominated by another overlord coming to torture you, just like Spoopcores past. But this time, you are Gerry--a man on a mission to save as many lost souls as he can, armed with nothing but a lantern and a portal home. You will need to turn your light off to find the souls, but leave it off for too long and you might be visited by another denizen of the darkness.
